verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> was king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over all Israel ס

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> And these [were] the princes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֑וֹ עֲזַרְיָ֥הוּ <S%H5838><s%> which he had Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest ס

אֱלִיחֹ֧רֶף <S%H456><s%> Elihoreph וַאֲחִיָּ֛ה <S%H281><s%> and Ahiah בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons שִׁישָׁ֖א <S%H7894><s%> of Shisha סֹפְרִ֑ים <S%H5608><s%> scribes יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיל֖וּד <S%H286><s%> of Ahilud הַמַּזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> the recorder

וּבְנָיָ֥הוּ <S%H1141><s%> And Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> [was] over the host וְצָד֥וֹק <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok וְאֶבְיָתָ֖ר <S%H54><s%> and Abiathar כֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> [were] the priests ס

וַעֲזַרְיָ֥הוּ <S%H5838><s%> And Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> of Nathan עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַנִּצָּבִ֑ים <S%H5324><s%> [was] over the officers וְזָב֧וּד <S%H2071><s%> and Zabud בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נָתָ֛ן <S%H5416><s%> of Nathan כֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> [was] principal officer רֵעֶ֥ה <S%H7463><s%> friend הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> [and] the king's

וַאֲחִישָׁ֖ר <S%H301><s%> And Ahishar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was over הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> [was] over the household וַאֲדֹנִירָ֥ם <S%H141><s%> and Adoniram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַבְדָּ֖א <S%H5653><s%> of Abda עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמַּֽס׃ <S%H4522><s%> [was] over the tribute ס

וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֞ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֤ר <S%H6240><s%> ten נִצָּבִים֙ <S%H5324><s%> officers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over all Israel וְכִלְכְּל֥וּ <S%H3557><s%> which provided victuals אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for the king וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and his household חֹ֧דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> his month בַּשָּׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> in a year יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over [אֶחָד כ] (הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> a ק) לְכַלְכֵּֽל׃ <S%H3557><s%> made provision ס
וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> And these [are] their names בֶּן־ ח֖וּר <S%H1133><s%> The son of Hur בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim ס

בֶּן־ דֶּ֛קֶר <S%H1128><s%> Ben-deker בְּמָקַ֥ץ <S%H4739><s%> in Makaz וּבְשַֽׁעַלְבִ֖ים <S%H8169><s%> and in Shaalbim וּבֵ֣ית שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> and Bethshemesh וְאֵיל֖וֹן בֵּ֥ית חָנָֽן׃ <S%H358><s%> and Elonbethhanan ס

בֶּן־ חֶ֖סֶד <S%H1136><s%> Ben-hesed בָּֽאֲרֻבּ֑וֹת <S%H700><s%> in Aruboth ל֥וֹ שֹׂכֹ֖ה <S%H7755><s%> to him [pertained] Sochoh וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and all the land חֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H2660><s%> of Hepher ס

בֶּן־ אֲבִֽינָדָ֖ב <S%H1125><s%> The son of Abinadab כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נָ֣פַת <S%H5299><s%> in all the region דֹּ֑אר <S%H1756><s%> of Dor טָפַת֙ <S%H2955><s%> which had Taphath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become לּ֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife ס

בַּֽעֲנָא֙ <S%H1195><s%> Baana בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיל֔וּד <S%H286><s%> of Ahilud תַּעְנַ֖ךְ <S%H8590><s%> [to him pertained] Taanach וּמְגִדּ֑וֹ <S%H4023><s%> and Megiddo וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֣ית שְׁאָ֡ן <S%H1052><s%> and all Bethshean אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which אֵ֨צֶל <S%H681><s%> which [is] by צָרְתַ֜נָה <S%H6891><s%> Zartanah מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash לְיִזְרְעֶ֗אל <S%H3157><s%> beneath Jezreel מִבֵּ֤ית שְׁאָן֙ <S%H1052><s%> from Bethshean עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> far אָבֵ֣ל מְחוֹלָ֔ה <S%H65><s%> to Abelmeholah עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> [even] unto [the place that is] beyond לְיָקְמֳעָֽם׃ <S%H3361><s%> Jokneam ס

בֶּן־ גֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1127><s%> The son of Geber בְּרָמֹ֣ת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> which [are] in Gilead ל֡וֹ חַוֹּת֩ <S%H2333><s%> to him [pertained] the towns יָאִ֨יר <S%H2971><s%> of Jair בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּגִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead ל֚וֹ חֶ֤בֶל <S%H2256><s%> to him [also pertained] the region אַרְגֹּב֙ <S%H709><s%> of Argob אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> which [is] in Bashan שִׁשִּׁים֙ <S%H8346><s%> threescore עָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> cities גְּדֹל֔וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great חוֹמָ֖ה <S%H2346><s%> with walls וּבְרִ֥יחַ <S%H1280><s%> bars נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> and brasen ס
אֲחִֽינָדָ֥ב <S%H292><s%> Ahinadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עִדֹּ֖א <S%H5714><s%> of Iddo מַחֲנָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4266><s%> [had] Mahanaim

אֲחִימַ֖עַץ <S%H290><s%> Ahimaaz בְּנַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> [was] in Naphtali גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָקַ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> he also took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּשְׂמַ֥ת <S%H1315><s%> Basmath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife
בַּֽעֲנָא֙ <S%H1195><s%> Baanah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חוּשָׁ֔י <S%H2365><s%> of Hushai בְּאָשֵׁ֖ר <S%H836><s%> [was] in Asher וּבְעָלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1175><s%> and in Aloth ס
יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פָּר֖וּחַ <S%H6515><s%> of Paruah בְּיִשָׂשכָֽר׃ <S%H3485><s%> in Issachar ס
שִׁמְעִ֥י <S%H8096><s%> Shimei בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֵלָ֖א <S%H414><s%> of Elah בְּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> in Benjamin ס

גֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1398><s%> Geber בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֻרִ֖י <S%H221><s%> of Uri בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [was] in the country גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [in] the country סִיח֣וֹן ׀ <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites וְעֹג֙ <S%H5747><s%> and of Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan וּנְצִ֥יב <S%H5333><s%> officer אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and [he was] the only אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> which [was] in the land

יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> [were] many כַּח֥וֹל <S%H2344><s%> as the sand אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> which [is] by the sea לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> in multitude אֹכְלִ֥ים <S%H398><s%> eating וְשֹׁתִ֖ים <S%H8354><s%> and drinking וּשְׂמֵחִֽים׃ <S%H8056><s%> and making merry

וּשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become מוֹשֵׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> reigned בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּמְלָכ֔וֹת <S%H4467><s%> over all kingdoms מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַנָּהָר֙ <S%H5104><s%> from the river אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> and to גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> and unto the border מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מַגִּשִׁ֥ים <S%H5066><s%> they brought מִנְחָ֛ה <S%H4503><s%> presents וְעֹבְדִ֥ים <S%H5647><s%> and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <S%H2416><s%> of his life פ

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become לֶֽחֶם־ <S%H3899><s%> provision שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon's לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> for one שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> was thirty כֹּר֙ <S%H3734><s%> measures סֹ֔לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour וְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> and threescore כֹּ֖ר <S%H3734><s%> measures קָֽמַח׃ <S%H7058><s%> of meal

עֲשָׂרָ֨ה <S%H6235><s%> Ten בָקָ֜ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen בְּרִאִ֗ים <S%H1277><s%> fat וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen רְעִ֖י <S%H7471><s%> out of the pastures וּמֵ֣אָה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred צֹ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep לְ֠בַד <S%H905><s%> alone מֵֽאַיָּ֤ל <S%H354><s%> beside harts וּצְבִי֙ <S%H6643><s%> and roebucks וְיַחְמ֔וּר <S%H3180><s%> and fallowdeer וּבַרְבֻּרִ֖ים <S%H1257><s%> fowl אֲבוּסִֽים׃ <S%H75><s%> and fatted

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֞וּא <S%H1931><s%> he רֹדֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H7287><s%> For he had dominion בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything עֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> over all [the region] on this side הַנָּהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> the river מִתִּפְסַח֙ <S%H8607><s%> from Tiphsah וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even עַזָּ֔ה <S%H5804><s%> even to Azzah בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכֵ֖י <S%H4428><s%> over all the kings עֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on this side הַנָּהָ֑ר <S%H5104><s%> the river וְשָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> and he had peace הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> had ל֛וֹ מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָרָ֖יו <S%H5676><s%> sides מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יְהוּדָ֨ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel לָבֶ֗טַח <S%H983><s%> safely אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> under גַּפְנוֹ֙ <S%H1612><s%> under his vine וְתַ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under תְּאֵֽנָת֔וֹ <S%H8384><s%> and under his fig tree מִדָּ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> from Dan וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> even to Beersheba כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon ס

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become לִשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> had forty אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אֻרְוֹ֥ת <S%H723><s%> stalls סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> of horses לְמֶרְכָּב֑וֹ <S%H4817><s%> for his chariots וּשְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand פָּרָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6571><s%> horsemen

וְכִלְכְּלוּ֩ <S%H3557><s%> provided victual הַנִּצָּבִ֨ים <S%H5324><s%> And those officers הָאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> Those אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וְאֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַקָּרֵ֛ב <S%H7131><s%> and for all that came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <S%H7979><s%> table הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> unto king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon's אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man חָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H2320><s%> in his month לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יְעַדְּר֖וּ <S%H5737><s%> they lacked דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> nothing

וְהַשְּׂעֹרִ֣ים <S%H8184><s%> Barley וְהַתֶּ֔בֶן <S%H8401><s%> also and straw לַסּוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> for the horses וְלָרָ֑כֶשׁ <S%H7409><s%> and dromedaries יָבִ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> they unto the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> it אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> where [the officers] were every man כְּמִשְׁפָּטֽוֹ׃ <S%H4941><s%> according to his charge ס
